S.FORM: niyazu' niyadu' kamu nu hulam: ) nuamisan nu Maibul ku Kuhkuh a niyazu'. . payniyazu' kamu nu hulam: ) payniyazu' sa izau amin ku tumuk. . niyaniyazu' kamu nu hulam: ) caay ka lecad ku lisin nu niyaniyazu'. . niyazu'ay kamu nu hulam: ) kasasukapah tu i niyazu'ay a tademaw. . sakiniyazu' kamu nu hulam: v atekakay ku balucu' ni Taymu tu sakiniyazu' a kakawaw. Taymu . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan kamu nu sakizaya: niyazu' https: e dictionary.apc.gov.tw ais search list.htm
